BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting employers from locking employees or other individuals inside a workplace and increasing the fines for obstruction of exits and unlawful change of exits.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting employers from locking employees or other individuals working inside a workplace.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting employers from locking employees or other individuals inside a workplace and increasing the fines for obstruction of exits and unlawful change of exits.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting employers from locking employees or other individuals working inside a workplace.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting employers from locking employees or other individuals inside a workplace and increasing the fines for obstruction of exits and unlawful change of exits.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting employers from locking employees or other individuals inside a workplace and increasing the fines for obstruction of exits and unlawful change of exits.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
